Text: Jihofa, u kwadʼe̩ me̩; hiane̩ wa ñw mi!
Je̩ ñw ma fʼaduwa-mi te̩ru jʼo̩gba-we̩ dabe̩ne̩ kʼotulale,
Mʼabo ide ko jʼalu-mi, O Jihofa,
Uwe̩ ki je̩ ñw e̩do̩-mi na rʼo̩wo̩ ugbo kʼe̩wñ e̩bie̩ne̩ du de̩
E̩no̩kpakpa ki gwo mi, ufe̩de̩nyo̩ i che,
E̩gba ku ma kʼamakajo̩-ma ro̩ jʼef okuta,
Todu eju-mi kad uwe̩, O Jihofa, Ondu;
Fʼumi de bʼoku ku ma bane̩ te̩ ñw mi te̩,
Je̩ ñw ame̩ne̩bibi ñwa rʼef iga-ma onugo,
